## 

```{r,echo=TRUE}
library(biplotEZ)
bp <- biplot(iris,scale=TRUE) |> 
  PCA(group.aes=iris$Species) |> 
  axes(col="black") |> 
  samples(col=c("pink","orange","firebrick3"),opacity = 0.7) |>
  plot()
```

## Interactivity

```{r}
#| fig-width: 9
#| fig-height: 6
library(ggplot2) ; library(plotly)
p <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(hp, mpg, color = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_point(size = 3, alpha = 0.85) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    title = "Fuel Efficiency vs Horsepower",
    x = "Horsepower", y = "Miles per Gallon", color = "Cyl"
  )
ggplotly(p)
```

## Interactive with a 3D plot

```{r}
#| fig-width: 9
#| fig-height: 6
library(plotly)

mtcars$am[which(mtcars$am == 0)] <- 'Automatic'
mtcars$am[which(mtcars$am == 1)] <- 'Manual'
mtcars$am <- as.factor(mtcars$am)

fig <- plot_ly(mtcars, x = ~wt, y = ~hp, z = ~qsec, color = ~am, colors = c('#BF382A', '#0C4B8E'))
fig <- fig %>% add_markers()
fig <- fig %>% layout(scene = list(xaxis = list(title = 'Weight'),
                     yaxis = list(title = 'Gross horsepower'),
                     zaxis = list(title = '1/4 mile time')))

fig
```

## Plot with `echarts4r` package

```{r}
#| fig-width: 9
#| fig-height: 6
library(echarts4r)
iris |> 
  group_by(Species) |> 
  e_charts(Sepal.Length) |> 
  e_line(Sepal.Width) |> 
  e_lm(Sepal.Width ~ Sepal.Length) |> 
  e_x_axis(min = 4)
```
